original_title: Sonny Jim and the Amusement Company, Ltd.
overview: A short comedy in which Jimmy organizes a show with cowboys and Indians. The highlight is the arrival of Buffalo Bill on a donkey. Jimmy goes to Sunday school, where he scares the teacher with a frog. As a punishment, he is not allowed to go to the picnic.
title: Sonny Jim and the Amusement Company, Ltd.
